name: evalAnswer
description: function to evaluate the answer given by a student to a question.
parameters: {'type': 'object', 'properties': {'feedback': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'feedback and explanation of why the given answer is right or wrong and how the student can improve.'}, 'goodAnswer': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'if the answer was right then True else the value is False', 'enum': ['True', 'False']}}}
